com.enjin.sdk.events

Class PusherNotificationService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.enjin.sdk.events.PusherNotificationService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NotificationsService

    public class PusherNotificationService
extends java.lang.Object
implements NotificationsService
    Implementation class of NotificationsService utilizing Pusher channel events.
    See Also:
    NotificationListener
